text: @realDonaldTrump I'm not a conspiracy theorist but I'm convinced COVID19 is a conspiracy against ur re-election.  Businesses shut down/over-regulated while rioters and looters destroy our country. Is that Social Distancing?  Full open the country-let us decide who we patronize.  OpenTheEconomy!

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
